name: IdeaScale
short_description:
IdeaScale is the largest cloud-based innovation software platform in the world
with more than 25,000 customers and 4 million users.
long_description:
IdeaScale is the largest cloud-based innovation software platform in the world
with more than 25,000 customers and 4 million users. The software allows
organizations to involve the opinions of public and private communities by
collecting their ideas and giving users a platform to vote. The ideas are then
evaluated, routed, and delivered on the back-end, making IdeaScale the engine of
innovation. IdeaScale's current client roster includes industry leaders, such as
EA Sports, NBC, NASA, Xerox and the White House.
